publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3918 Patricia Ferguson: Lambhill Stablesâ€”That the Parliament notes the groundbreaking ceremony that took place at Lambhill Stables on 16 April 2009; also notes the innovative environmental-based learning that the project seeks to make available to the local community, and wishes the project well in its bid to obtain funding to allow the restoration of the historic Lambhill Stables. Supported by: Mary Mulligan*, Bill Butler*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-3918 Lambhill Stables (lodged on 16 April 2009) Jackie Baillie*
S3M-3918 Lambhill Stables (lodged on 16 April 2009) Trish Godman*
S3M-3918 Lambhill Stables (lodged on 16 April 2009) Patrick Harvie*, Hugh Henry*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-3918 Lambhill Stables (lodged on 16 April 2009) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-3918 Lambhill Stables (lodged on 16 April 2009) Stuart McMillan*, Pauline McNeill*
S3M-3918 Lambhill Stables (lodged on 16 April 2009) Bob Doris*
